We report on the experience of re-introducing Scrum in a project team that had previously failed to adopt that agile method. We explore the reasons we believe that caused the failure and explain how we approached the team to uncover them. Then, we describe our strategy to avoid incurring in ...

Abstract:
This paper proposes a way of extending eXtreme Programming (XP) practices, in particular the original planning game and the ... practices, in particular the original planning game and the coding guidelines, , to aid the developers and the customer to engineer ... maintaining the iterative and rapid feedback-driven nature of XP. The introduced extensions also aid in formulating security-specific coding and design standards to be used in the project, ... project, as well as in understanding the need for supporting specific Security-related User stories by the system.
